alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 1:44PM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM CST /2 PM MST/ THURSDAY TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 PM CST /2 PM MST/ Thursday to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
